name: Signs of a Psychopath
overview: This harrowing half-hour archive series revisits some of the most brutal killers in modern history, reviewing news footage and the words of the killers themselves to see which terrifying traits each killer exhibited. What are the signs...of evil?

episodes.name: Chase Me
episodes.overview: A 50-year-old woman is found dead in her home. All that's left behind is a note that reads, "Chase me." But when detectives uncover the killer, they quickly discover they have come face to face with a remorseless psychopath.

episodes.name: Into the Woods at Midnight
episodes.overview: Residents of a quaint village are terrified when a local innkeeper and two others are found brutally murdered. Detectives in Maine must follow the depraved killer into the woods at night as he leads them to where he killed and buried a fourth victim.

episodes.name: I'm Not the Monster I Was
episodes.overview: An unapologetic 14-year-old boy confesses to the murder of his best friend. Twelve years later, he's back in court with chance at a reduced sentence. Has this 26-year-old really changed? Or is he the same meticulous, cold-blooded killer he always was?

episodes.name: Where Evil Grows
episodes.overview: A charming 20-year-old wants to help authorities with a murder investigation. He claims to have met one of the three victims and says he has no knowledge of the crime, but detectives suspect otherwise. Could this intellectual be hiding a dark side?

episodes.name: I Dug a Hole and Said a Prayer
episodes.overview: When police question a man in his pregnant ex-girlfriend and her young son's disappearance, they discover he has a terrifying capacity for violence. Later, a seemingly innocuous man searching for a missing girl could be a real-life monster.

episodes.name: I Could Hear Her Calling Me
I Am The Devil
episodes.overview: A missing Colorado woman's roommate claims she'll do anything to help find her, but investigators fear they may have a rare female psychopath on their hands. Later, a killer's angry outbursts could be real, or just an act put on by a manipulator.

episodes.name: Now They Lay Me Down To Sleep - Part 1
episodes.overview: After a house fire in Texas, suspicion lands on John Hummel when his family's brutally murdered bodies are discovered in the ashes, and he doesn't blink an eye. Now an inmate on death row, he grants a final interview weeks before his execution.

episodes.name: Now They Lay Me Down To Sleep - Part 2
episodes.overview: Death row inmate John Hummel agrees to a final interview weeks before his execution.

episodes.name: I Didn't Do Anything
episodes.overview: An arrogant woman believes she's committed the perfect crime. She is wrong.

episodes.name: Fantasy Over Family
episodes.overview: An obsession with a web-cam model leads to the annihilation of a family.

episodes.name: Guess I've Got No Conscience
episodes.overview: A prolific serial killer brags on tape about strangling eight young women.

episodes.name: Diary of a Psychopath
episodes.overview: A college student disappears at the start of his freshman year without a trace, leaving his family and his girlfriend reeling; when authorities look to his best friend for answers, they uncover a love triangle gone wrong.

episodes.name: I Have a Surprise for You
episodes.overview: After coming home to find her parents on the floor bleeding, a woman's younger brother claims their father shot their mother before turning the gun on himself.

episodes.name: Only if There's Something in it for Me
episodes.overview: While being questioned in the abduction of an Anchorage barista, a young local businessman starts negotiating with investigators to reveal details of a depraved secret life as one of America's most meticulous and psychopathic serial killers.

episodes.name: I Am Strange
episodes.overview: A heartless gunman shoots a young couple with devastating consequences.

episodes.name: The Good Girl
episodes.overview: A home invasion leads to the revelation of a shocking double life.

episodes.name: Do Her Mortal Harm
episodes.overview: The naked and mutilated body of a mother turns up at the bottom of a ravine in Baton Rouge, Louisiana. When tire tracks lead investigators to a suspect, they encounter an undetected serial killer who confesses to butchering eight women over a decade.

episodes.name: I Killed Him. Boom. Boom.
episodes.overview: Police respond to a 911 call to find a father of two dead in his home with more than 15 gunshot wounds. Police question the family, but one person is missing, his mother-in-law. Now detectives must determine if this grandma could be a deadly psychopath.

episodes.name: You Met the Angel of Death
episodes.overview: When a graduate student suddenly goes missing, the family he's staying with immediately contacts police. Then, just days later, a horrific discovery forces investigators to face a rare kind of monster.

episodes.name: I'm Just a Sick Monster
episodes.overview: An officer responds to a 911 call placed by a robber on the lam who feels compelled to turn himself in. However, when the officer arrives at the scene, the criminal confesses to much more than breaking and entering.

episodes.name: She Isn't Acting Dead Enough
episodes.overview: A man crashes into the back of a woman's vehicle early one morning. Officers respond to the scene only to find her car abandoned. Witnesses point to the other driver, and detectives are horrified to discover a sadistic psychopath who admits to murder.

episodes.name: Everyone Has a Death Sentence
episodes.overview: The "Tourniquet Killer" terrorizes young girls across Houston, Texas. When advances in DNA finally lead to his arrest, this psychopath eagerly confesses to multiple murders.

episodes.name: Sleeping Beauties
episodes.overview: First responders arrive at a home in Ontario where a mother leads officers to the bodies of her two children. An investigation yields the truth: this awful tragedy isn't an accident but a carefully crafted killing by a vengeful psychopath.

episodes.name: God Was Using Me
episodes.overview: A longtime nurse confesses to helping end the lives of numerous elderly patients at multiple nursing homes; detectives discover this is no angel of mercy; behind her unsuspecting persona lies a ruthless psychopath.

episodes.name: Most People Would Be Haunted
episodes.overview: A failed actor take out his rage on the weakest members of society; after killing four people, a chance encounter with police leads to his downfall; the interrogation room becomes the stage for this killer's final performance.

episodes.name: I Knew She Lived Alone
episodes.overview: Burlington Police get a call that a man killed his girlfriend. At the scene they find the man calm while his girlfriend's body lies nearby. He explains that he has other victims, revealing a history of psychopathic sexual deviancy.

episodes.name: I Was a Star
episodes.overview: A woman dies in a brutal stabbing at home. Police quickly locate the prime suspect: Antoine Bynum. In his interrogation, he appears to have a psychotic episode until detectives discover it's merely the ruse of a deranged psychopath.

episodes.name: Sometimes People Get Shot
episodes.overview: A 17-year-old breaks into his family's cabin and steals a gun before beginning a horrifying road trip through Iowa. When officers catch up with him, a haunting portrait of a burgeoning psychopathic killer emerges.

episodes.name: I Call Him Moster
episodes.overview: Police respond to the site of a car crash alongside a highway in Grand Rapids, Michigan. Investigators at the scene quickly realize this is no accident, but rather an elaborate cover up for cold-blooded murder by relentless psychopath.

episodes.name: The Women On His List
episodes.overview: In rural Wilno, Ontario a vigilante leaves his home on a mission to confront three women who have rejected him over the years. His confession gives investigators picture of a cold-hearted psychopath with a long history of abusing women.

episodes.name: He's Not Among the Living
episodes.overview: A woman reports her boyfriend is missing after finding a pool of blood in their apartment. When investigators start their search for answers, they are confronted with a sinister plot hatched by their roommate.

episodes.name: I Guess My Life Is Over Now
episodes.overview: A mother who calls 911 to report her 32-year-old son is threatening her turns up dead in her home; he becomes the only suspect, and when he turns himself in, his pragmatic retelling of the slaying isn't just cold hearted, it's psychopathic.

episodes.name: I Was in a Zone
episodes.overview: A crash on a North Dakota highway leaves one passenger dead but the driver unscathed; when investigators see that the victim has stab wounds, they know there was foul play; detectives interrogate the driver.

episodes.name: It Wanted to Kill Somebody
episodes.overview: Searchers for a missing woman find her brutally beaten body in a dilapidated house near her home. The case goes cold until a local teen steps forward to reveal that he's not only the killer but also a manipulative psychopath with a thirst for violence.

episodes.name: Heat Will Destroy
episodes.overview: After his conviction for the brutal slaying of his wife, a Florida inmate lays claim to another unsolved murder 17 years prior, revealing that he's a manipulative psychopath with a history of violence and an unquenchable thirst for revenge.

episodes.name: Hell to Look Forward To
episodes.overview: A man confesses to accidentally killing his best friend while cleaning his gun; during his interrogation, he stuns police by revealing that he’s behind a long trail of bloodshed and is a serial killer who seems to consider himself an angel of mercy.

episodes.name: I Wanted Her to Hear It
episodes.overview: A man finds his girlfriend and her mother murdered in their beds at night; he calls 911 for help, but police discover his urge to seek revenge.

episodes.name: I’m Gonna Recycle a Snitch
episodes.overview: Behind a church lies a dismembered body burned beyond recognition; investigators identify the victim and receive a tip the suspect is a female; a police interview reveals her as the most remorseless psychopathic killer they’ve ever seen.

episodes.name: Ladies First
episodes.overview: When a beloved elderly couple disappears on a Sunday afternoon, one person knows their battered lie dead at the bottom of a well; that man is the couple’s son, who lives off his parent’s charity yet takes pleasure in murdering them.

episodes.name: In My Van, I’m the Aggressor
episodes.overview: When Omaha, Neb., police officers arrest the driver of a stolen van, he shocks detectives by giving an unsolicited confession to a gruesome murder, and it is only the first of many chilling revelations.

episodes.name: I'm a Sick Puppy
episodes.overview: When a priest from Florida goes missing, police focus on a troubled ex-convict whom he helped support; through multiple interrogations, a psychopathic killer reveals details of a twisted vengeance that escalates to a chilling murder.

episodes.name: How to Spot a Psychopath
episodes.overview: Traits of psychopath lurk in us all, but for whom does it lead to murder?

episodes.name: Something a Man Would Do
episodes.overview: A woman finds her elderly brother dead in his bedroom with his throat slashed. Uncovering the truth poses a challenge for detectives, as the individual responsible for killing him is a manipulative psychopath who craftily deflects blame.

episodes.name: Hey Look, I'm a Serial Killer
episodes.overview: A racially motivated serial killer on death row, who targeted civil rights leader Vernon Jordan and pornography publisher Larry Flynt, confesses to additional unsolved murders with the help of a shrewd female prosecutor.

episodes.name: Having Breakfast on Him
episodes.overview:
« Previous Ep. Next Ep. »

Investigators search a farm for a missing man and find human leg bone on the property. The owner, Susan Monica, admits that her pigs ate her tenant alive, and he's not the only victim. A ruthless psychopath, Monica despises humans but loves her pigs.

episodes.name: He Didn't Know I Was There
episodes.overview: A gunman shoots a man dead as he runs along a country road. First responders find a witness standing next to the body with a strange story to tell, and detectives will unravel the lies of a callous psychopath who takes out his frustrations in bloodshed.

episodes.name: He Thought We Were Buddies
episodes.overview: A man calls 911 with his dying breath, and first responders arrive to find him brutally murdered, stabbed 59 times. When detectives question his best friend, they uncover a tangled, sick story of deception and jealousy that explodes in psychopathic rage.

episodes.name: I Still Care About Her
episodes.overview: A killer shoots a young woman dead in her boyfriend's Orlando apartment. Hours later, he turns up in a hospital bed 500 miles away with a gunshot wound and a bizarre story that unravels to reveal he's a lying, callous psychopath.

episodes.name: Kids Will Be Kids
episodes.overview: Police find a 17-year-old female's dead body in a ditch with two gunshot wounds. The investigation centers on two friends of the victim claiming her death was an accident, but detectives uncover it was a thrill kill carried out by evil psychopaths.

episodes.name: An Excuse to Kill Somebody
episodes.overview: A New Hampshire village is in shock after four adolescents were arrested for robbing and murdering a 42-year-old mother and maiming her 11-year-old daughter. Detectives discover two individuals who are vicious psychopaths rather than ordinary criminals.

episodes.name: This is What I Chose to Be
episodes.overview: A missing person's report leads police to a career criminal and his partner, uncovering a twisted path of illicit schemes, drugs, and exploitation.

episodes.name: Deadly Women
episodes.overview: When women kill, it’s shocking to many of us. However, female psychopaths may not be as rare as we imagine. We’ll examine some of the unique characteristics of female psychopathic killers, and explore the horrific crimes that they’ve committed.

episodes.name: I'm Not Your Typical Murderer
episodes.overview: A frantic graduate student calls 911 to say she just shot her boyfriend in self-defense. Police soon discover that her story doesn't add up and realize they are face-to-face with a remorseless, calculating psychopath.

episodes.name: Family Comes First
episodes.overview: Eleven operators receive a terrifying call from a youngster who claims he stabbed his parents to death. Unsure if the call is a Halloween joke, police rush to the area, only to learn that it is not a fake and that the caller is a budding psychopath.

episodes.name: It Was a Frenzy
episodes.overview: A teen plays out his sadistic fantasies of murder on an unassuming drifter.

episodes.name: The Monster Has Always Been There
episodes.overview: A 911 operator receives a frightening call from a man who claims that he stabbed and killed two people. Police rapidly learn that not only is the call legitimate, but the caller is a violent and unpredictable psychotic.

episodes.name: I'm Telling You I'm Dangerous
episodes.overview: In rural Missouri, police receive a chilling call from a 50-year-old man who claims to have shot three individuals inside his home. Detectives discover that this impulsive massacre had a purpose, and that the culprit is a psychopath obsessed with control.

episodes.name: He Had it Coming
episodes.overview: A concerned mother reports her 24-year-old son missing. He has fallen under the spell of a 47-year-old widowed woman. Detectives soon realize she's a sexual psychopath who has claimed the lives of more than one admirer.

episodes.name: Make Sure You Get My Good Side
episodes.overview: A road rage incident turns deadly as an elderly man is beaten to death by a teenager who claims he was acting in self-defense. Detectives not only find holes in his story but uncover that he is a remorseless and utterly manipulative psychopath.

episodes.name: I'm Am the Weirdest Guy
episodes.overview: A mother awakes to find her two sons with their throats cut. Their aunt's boyfriend confesses to his mother, and she wears a wire to capture her son. As he admits his guilt, it's clear how a psychopathic rage led to horrific violence and innocent victims.

episodes.name: Ties That Bind
episodes.overview: Experts explore cases of psychopathic killers known as family annihilators.

episodes.name: I Love Something So I Kill It
episodes.overview: On a quiet winter night, a mother finds her 22-year-old son horrifically dismembered in her basement. The lone suspect is the victim's ex-girlfriend, who is at her home in an emotionless state with blood on her hands.

episodes.name: I Slept With a Knife
episodes.overview: Weeks after an 18-year-old man's friend reports him missing, his clothing turns up burned in a trash can behind a suburban home. When witnesses lead investigators to a young man with a history of violence, they soon learn he had not worked alone.

episodes.name: Unorthodox and Weird
episodes.overview: A 19-year-old woman vanishes, and the suspect is a former high school classmate with whom she had been communicating days earlier. The family is weary, for the suspect has a notorious past filled with sexual deviancy and homicidal urges toward women.

episodes.name: His Parents Didn't Like Me
episodes.overview: A man finds his family slaughtered in their West Virginia home. The oldest son, 16-year-old Gavin Smith, is missing, he turns up hiding at his girlfriend's.

episodes.name: You’re Never Going To Get it Out of Me
episodes.overview: After his wife vanishes from Jackson, Missouri., a psychopath plays cat and mouse with detectives.

episodes.name: My Pretty White Shoelaces
episodes.overview: Hikers in Portland discover the badly decomposed body of a raped and strangled young girl. A month later, another woman turns up brutally murdered in same fashion. The prime suspect is a homeless drifter harboring dark sexual fantasies.

episodes.name: You're Not Leaving
episodes.overview: A 33-year-old oil rig worker calls 911 to report his girlfriend missing. He seems to be helping in the time-critical hunt to find her. A failed polygraph test leads detectives to suspect this seemingly caring boyfriend is a psychopath.

episodes.name: She Said She Didn't Care
episodes.overview: Six months pregnant Martine Bernard's family reports her missing, days later, her father vanishes as well. When officers interview Martine's husband, Cassandritz Blanc, they find a calculating psychopath willing to do anything to cover his tracks.

episodes.name: I'm Not a Weirdo
episodes.overview: When a 64-year-old grandmother does not return home from her morning walk, local police uncover that the man responsible for her disappearance is not only a pathological liar but a sexually deviant psychopath carrying out a twisted fantasy.

episodes.name: Birth of a Psychopath
episodes.overview: Every parent's worst nightmare is the possibility that their child has the same evil traits as the most heinous murderers.

episodes.name: Stranger, danger
episodes.overview: A disgruntled man decides that killing someone will make him feel better, so he chooses a random stranger and uses nine rounds to ruin two families' lives. Next, an egotistical kid attempts to persuade investigators that he beat a senior citizen to death in self-defense.

episodes.name: Malicious intent
episodes.overview: A husband cannot tolerate his in-laws staying with him and decides to remove them and his wife permanently. A killer admits his victim was no friend of his after first telling police the man was his best pal.

episodes.name: Young and deadly
episodes.overview: Teens break into a sleeping woman's home and mercilessly kill her and maim her daughter with a machete. As they coldly recount the night, police realize they are dealing with sociopaths. Two teens devise a devious plot to kill a girl in cold blood.

episodes.name: Wicked woman
episodes.overview: A missing man's half-eaten remains turn up in a pig pen, and the owner claims she shot him in a mercy killing, but there's another dark secret buried on her land. A woman fiercely denies her part in a murder, but her boyfriend knows the truth.

episodes.name: Fatal fury
episodes.overview: A sadist blames his girlfriend's murder on a friend, but after a visit from his aunt, he spills the terrible truth. Two kids are dead, and the killer refuses to talk to police.

episodes.name: Lethal leftovers
episodes.overview: A long-distance couple's happy reunion turns sour when a fight leads to the woman's disappearance but one person knows exactly where she is. Then, a bucket with horrific contents stuns police, but learning the circumstances around it, terrifies them.

episodes.name: Not going to get it out of me
